post.body: :-) I loove being in college, it's the ultimate excuse "I can't buy gifts this year-I'm broke cuz I'm in college"
yea it works good to make it strong but if I over do it, then it's stiff-city
jeepers! If I left protein in my hair that long it would literally "break up" with me!! :)
finders keepers!
uhh...I can't wait for school to be over...finals start the 16th
I love ur new locs!!!!
He and everyone else are just going to have to get used to it :)
my friend came 2 pick me up last night & before he said hi he was like "what's wrong with your hair?' <insert stank face>
I thought about u last night & the part of ur letter to ur when u said ur ex didnt like ur hair...
thanks for the support, I need it!
yea, I've been kinda on and off about it for awhile,everyday I say I'm going to quit but I haven't relaxed since May :)
yay! you should do it! :-)
you could always buy me something if you can't decide on something for yourself :-)
{{Shannon get off the computer and take a nap b4 it's too late!!!}}
I work in friggin' retail WHY did I have to be to work at 6am today!?!
i love Sundays http://postsecret.blogspot.com/
all this work may be in vain...I might have already failed this class...
I still haven't found an energy drink that works for me :( the 5-hour energy shot was a failure
trying to stay awake and do homework...I feel like taking next semester off... :(
waiting for Nayonna to come over so we can eat a whole can of cinnamon rolls! yuuumm!
...thought about relaxing my hair again last night...but did a braid out instead and it turn out great...going natural is hard man :)
I hate when people I respect do stupid stuff
:( my stomach hurts
baby-sitting my little cousins, can't believe they let me sleep until 9 this morning!!
I'm happy that I heard from the new guy earlier today :-) but sad that he had to fly home for Christmas... :(
I am sooo ready for bed :( I'm way too young to spend my Saturday nights like this...
I just realized that I forgot to eat today...no wonder I don't feel well...
just when I thought I was getting over this stupid cold, it tries to knock me back out :(
heello new boy, goodbye old boy who is now on my phone getting on my nerves (dont u have something better to do on a Friday night?)
hmmm...should have taken my shower before I flat ironed my hair...darnit
I convinced myself to flat iron my hair today which I haven't done in a loong time since I've been transitioning...&of course it rains today
today was a good day! Finished my hardest final, and purchased a $79 dress for $5! Gotta luv markdowns and employee discounts!!
PRAISE GOD! I am FINALLY done with that project and my good for nothing group members!
I'm in class about to present my project pleeeaze pray for me!!!!!
